summary: So I've been doing some testing on how I would like to do a comfy wearable are reactor. I think I've gotten the major parts...
body:
So I’ve been doing some testing on how I would like to do a comfy wearable are reactor. I think I’ve gotten the major parts ironed out. I just have to decide a few more aspects of it and make clean cuts(currently free handed it).

I’ll post the final result.

tags: tony stark is a pretty princess
cap would so have lip chap are you kidding me
summary: So I was thinking about Tony’s hands (not like that ;) ....okay, this time not like that) and I was wondering about what they...
body:
So I was thinking about Tony’s hands (not like that ;) ….okay, this time not like that) and I was wondering about what they were like. Most fics described them as rough or calloused right? And while, yes, logically a mechanic’s hands would be pretty rough and especially our disaster boy Tony would hurt himself a lot in the lab, but hear me out…

Tony is a pretty little princess and I have CONVINCED myself that his hands are surprisingly soft because he’s obsessed with moisturizer. I imagine Tony slapping some hand cream on every few hours, being surprisingly diligent about anti-aging cream (gotta preserve his money maker ;P) and putting on chap stick all the time to keep his lips soft and kissable.

For your consideration: After Tony gets back from Afghanistan, is skin is all sunburned from wandering around in the dessert. After a cheeseburger Tony makes Rhodey grab him some aloe vera and buckets of moisturizer, because “I CANNOT PEEL RHODEY. I NEED TO SAVE MY BEAUTIFUL SKIN.” 

Or, picture this: Mid battle. Things are crazy. Tony has just blasted some bad guys into oblivion and then…he smacks his lips. hmm a little dry…He thinks. But he doesn’t have any chap stick in his iron man Armour…

Tony: Nat! Very important to the mission. Have you got any lip balm?

Nat: Tony what the hell! We’re in the middle of a fight! Why would I be carrying lip balm!?

Steve: I’ve got some chap stick? 

Tony: Of course you do- gimme. 

In conclusion, you will never convince me Tony Stark’s hands are rough. He is a cosmetics queen. Live with it.

summary:
Peter: *hands fidget* Mr. Stark, I have something I need to tell you.
Tony, concerned: Yeah, kid, what’s up?
Peter: I... I think...
body:
Peter: *hands fidget* Mr. Stark, I have something I need to tell you.

Tony, concerned: Yeah, kid, what’s up?

Peter: I… I think I may have an addiction.

Tony: Peter, I’m so glad you came to me. We’re going to get through this and you’re going to be ok. I just need to know what you’re struggling with. Is it alcohol, painkillers, coc-

Peter: Chapstick!

Tony: …

Peter: …

Tony: …Chapstick?

Peter: Yes. I’m so sorry I really didn’t mean for this to happen!

Tony: *kneads forehead* Kid, you cant get addicted to chapstick.

Peter: BuT It’S MeDIcaTED!!!

Tony: *groans* that’s not the way it wor-

Peter, sobbing: I JUST LOVE THE WAY IT MAKES MY LIPS TINGLE

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Under the Stars
title: Under the Stars
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2F7Vxr4

by harley328

“Well, what do stars do best?” Maia asked Peter, a sly mile gracing her face.

“Explode and create a bunch of cool stuff?” He replied “Wait no! They’re really good at annoying guys called Peter!”

Maia falls to Earth and must adjust to this new life, then she must fight for it before it is too late. Stardust AU (low key I guess).

That fine mix between a highschool fanfic, an action fanfic and a fantasy fanfic

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: it's always you
title: it's always you
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2CKt6OD

by Quillium

There’s a stranger in front of her room with a guitar in hand, singing.

Pepper drags a hand over her face and sighs, “Tell Tony that when I said that it would be nice to be seduced by a man with a guitar, I meant him, not someone he hired.”

summary: Here Among the Stars
title: Here Among the Stars
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2QjaTLi

by rosycheeked

“If I’d told you, Steve, told you before today, would you have told it to me back? Would you have kissed me? Or would you have turned me away with that sad little smile, the sincerity in your gaze, the regret—it kills me, sometimes, how honest you are. Except when it counted most.”

Or, Tony makes a second recording. To Steve.

by rosycheeked

“If I’d told you, Steve, told you before today, would you have told it to me back? Would you have kissed me? Or would you have turned me away with that sad little smile, the sincerity in your gaze, the regret—it kills me, sometimes, how honest you are. Except when it counted most.”

Or, Tony makes a second recording. To Steve.

summary:
My little Science Bros texts – 03 – Something Special. 
Banner trembled slightly on the bed, in the darkened room... He wasn’t...
caption:
My little Science Bros texts – 03 – Something Special.

Banner trembled slightly on the bed, in the darkened room… He wasn’t feeling well, he had become too nervous with what had happened, he had to calm down, but he had scared so many people that Tony had to take charge… He was trembling so much that he didn’t even hear when the door opened slowly and after a few seconds it closed again, he saw blur for his condition, but he saw it… a light that was approaching him… that unmistakable aroma… Nobody said anything. One couldn’t and the other didn’t want to disturb the first one. Bruce kept seeing that comforting light, closer and closer… until the other sat down right in front of him. He couldn’t help and raise his hand slightly to Tony’s chest, barely touching the arc reactor, he didn’t want to dim his light, just… feel how it calmed him down.

blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

summary: Koschei
title: Koschei
body:
“It was beautiful. Like nothing I’ve ever seen before. It was like an everlasting sunset on a plane of nothingness.” - Ava Collins

Pulvis et umbra sumus

I sit silently by myself on the quinjet. I’m trying to think about all the different ways this is going to go down. I like to act tough, but I’m scared shitless. I am sweating and pale and I’m…

Read more…
